explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes an improved support vector regression (v-SVR) algorithm, which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.supervised learning: The v-SVR algorithm is a type of supervised learning as it uses measured load spectrum data for prediction.
explanations.regression: The paper uses support vector regression (v-SVR) to predict the equivalent load spectrum, which is a regression task.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper specifically mentions the use of an improved support vector regression (v-SVR) algorithm.
explanations.SVM: SVM is the abbreviation for support vector machine, which is the core algorithm used in the paper.
